purpose: Facilitates the rapid development and coordination of chatbot and multi-agent applications through a workflow-based approach.
principle: Built on LangGraph and Langchain, it allows users to create workflows for multi-agent coordination using FastAPI and NextJS.
reusability: Offers a low-code environment with APIs for integrating custom workflows and agents, supporting modular and reusable components.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential stability issues.
name: flock
description: Flock is a workflow-based low-code platform for rapidly building chatbots, RAG, and coordinating multi-agent teams, powered by LangGraph, Langchain, FastAPI, and NextJS.（Flock 是一个基于workflow工作流的低代码平台，用于快速构建聊天机器人、RAG、Agent和Muti-Agent应用，采用 LangGraph、Langchain、FastAPI 和 NextJS 构建。）
highlight: A low-code platform for building and orchestrating chatbots and multi-agent systems using workflows.
